page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE IN RADSTOCK
page.content: My family by Kirsty Butt. There are five members in my family, my mother, my father, my brother, my sister and me. We live in Waterloo Road Radstock in the same house that my greatgrandfather used to lodge in when he worked in the mine. My dad works as a printer at Welton bag factory and my mum works at a Playschool in Radstock. My hobbies are swimming, stamp collecting, trampolining and reading.My sister also has these hobbies. My brother likes bird watching and goes to a young ornithologist club. Every Saturday we go swimming and trampolining at South Wansdyke Sports Centre, we also go to church every Sunday. Our family goes on at least one holiday a year together but I also go on school and guide camps.
